name: The Scratch Runner V.1.0
description:
The Scratch Runner

⭐ about ⭐

    This is a game I working for 1 week .But after you play this and you got some bug please let me know in comments box.Thanks

⭐ how to play ⭐

    ⭐Press the button as you set . You can change in settings menu.

    ⭐Don't touch obstacles.

    ⭐Get the potion for super power.

All so thanks you for playing!
